bach.DataFrame.rollup¶

DataFrame.rollup(by)[source]¶

Group by and roll up over the column(s) by, replacing any current grouping.

Parameters

by (Optional[Union[str, Series, List[Union[str, Series]]]]) – the series to group by and roll up. Can be a column or index name str, a Series or a list of any of those. If Series are passed, they should have the same base node as the DataFrame.

Returns

a new DataFrame object with the group_by attribute set.

Return type

DataFrame
